page.title: 07Kington :Secondary Education
page.content: {(cont) Certificate of Secondary Education. 'A' level examinations are taken in some of these subjects. Two completely new ideas are being introduced into our school. One is a Technical and Vocational Educational Course for 4th and 5th formers for which pupils have to travel to Hereford for two mornings a week. The other is several new sixth form courses particulary for those not wanting to do 'A' levels including Business Studies and Design and Technology. There are 34 full-time teachers in the school. There are also 5 music teachers who come in once a week to teach violin, flute, clarinet and 'cello.
